item.title: An exploration of patient infomation of COVID in South Korea
item.description: require(tidyverse) require(ggplot2) Overview of assignment requirement VisualizationofdataingraphicalformatusingR.Submission deadline: 2020-03-23 14:00 (5% of final mark, no re-sit) Obtain a public health dataset (different from Assignment 1, from published papers, government websites, or your own research) that is suitable for producing graphs. Import the dataset into an R project in an R markdown report. Plot three of the following graphs with the dataset in the report:scatterplot, pie chart, bar graph, and box graph.
